ddl: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, email TEXT);
CREATE TABLE products (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, price DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE orders (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, total DECIMAL, created_at DATE);
input: What is the total revenue in 2023?
expected: SELECT SUM(total) FROM orders WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';

ddl: CREATE TABLE employees (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, department TEXT, salary INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE articles (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, views INTEGER, author_id INTEGER);
expected: SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10;
